quote: If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.  – Wayne Dyer
fact: The Eisenhower interstate system requires that one mile in every five must be straight in case of war or emergency, they could be used as airstrips.
joke: A man walks into a bar and orders helicopter flavor chips. The barman replies “sorry mate we only do plain”
